channel.title: It's best to follow advice from your evil allies
channel.description:
Not sure what others think, but in my experience I've found it's best to follow advice from your evil allies even if you think you have a better idea. This might be for several reasons:
- If they are confident enough to suggest you do something different from what you were planning to do, they probably have a good reason to be so confident
- Team members following the same mediocre plan is more effective than different members following plans that, assuming each individual were their own team, would be better plans
